title: Russian, Chinese ships patrolled 'near Alaska' but were not 'a threat': US officials
description: U.S. Northern Command has confirmed Sunday that a Russian and Chinese naval formation patrolled near Alaska last week.

title: 2 killed, 3 injured in Long Beach boat fire: Fire department
description: A boat fire in Long Beach, California, killed two people and injured three others, according to fire officials.

title: WATCH:  Home collapses into river amid flooding in Alaska after glacial break
description: Bystanders could only watch as a home collapsed into the Mendenhall River in Juneau, Alaska, amid major flooding in the state.

title: Conservative groups sue to block Biden plan canceling $39 billion in student loans
description: The plan would cancel $39 billion in student loans for 800,000 borrowers.

title: Glacial break causes major flooding in Alaska, officials issue emergency declaration
description: A glacier lake outburst flood is wreaking havoc near Juneau, Alaska, where structures have been destroyed as a result of a break on the Mendenhall Glacier.

title: House fire and reported explosion kills 2 and injures another, authorities say
description: Authorities say two people in their 90s are dead and a third person has been injured in a fire and reported explosion that destroyed a home in Indiana

title: Coroner: Man whose body was found in a barrel in Malibu had been shot in the head
description: A coroner has determined that a man whose naked body was found inside a barrel in Malibu, California, last week was shot in the head

title: Pence: 'No plans to testify' at Trump's Jan. 6 trial but would 'comply with the law'
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence didn't rule out testifying at Trump's trial over his efforts to overturn the 2020 election results

title: At least 24 people dead in bus crash in central Morocco, authorities say
description: At least 24 people died in a bus crash Sunday in the central Azilal province of Morocco, marking one of the deadliest such accidents in recent years in the country

title: Russia mounts a massive missile and drone attack against Ukraine following its retaliation promise
description: Kremlin had vowed to retaliate for a Ukrainian attack on a Russian tanker.

title: Woman found dead on Phoenix-area hike, authorities say it may be heat related
description: Authorities say an Oregon woman missing on a hike in north Phoenix has been found dead and it appears to be heat-related

title: Fort Lauderdale airport temporarily evacuated over security investigation
description: A check-in area of a terminal at Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport was temporarily evacuated because of a security-related law enforcement investigation

title: Tropical Storm Eugene is strengthening off Mexico's western Pacific coast
description: Tropical Storm Eugene strengthened off Mexico’s Pacific coast

title: Trump lawyer welcomes Pence testifying in Jan. 6 trial, won't say if Trump will too
description: Trump's attorney John Lauro on Sunday welcomed former Mike Pence potentially testifying at Trump's Jan. 6 trial but wouldn't discuss if Trump will do the same

title: WATCH:  Deputy intercepts runaway boat
description: Body camera footage shows a deputy in Clearwater, Florida, chasing after a speeding vessel, working to slow it down. The boat’s driver had fallen off, but was rescued by a good Samaritan.

title: WATCH:  Man befriends dog before stealing bike from garage
description: As a suspected bike thief was about to get away, he was stopped by the family dog for some belly rubs.

title: Musk says his cage fight with Zuckerberg will be streamed on X
description: Elon Musk says his potential in-person fight with Mark Zuckerberg would be streamed live on his social media site X, formerly known as Twitter

title: Train derailment kills at least 15, injures 50 in southern Pakistan, officials say
description: Railway officials say at least 15 passengers were killed and 50 more injured when a train derailed near the town of Nawabshah in southern Sindh province

title: USA even with Sweden at halftime in World Cup knockout round in Australia
description: The United States is taking on Sweden on Sunday in a World Cup knockout match pitting the reigning champions against a hard-charging team on a winning streak.

title: From high office to high security prison for ex-Pakistani PM Imran Khan after court sentencing
description: Pakistan's former Prime Minister Imran Khan has spent the night in a high-security prison after he was arrested at his home

title: NASCAR suspends driver Noah Gragson for liking an insensitive meme with George Floyd's face
description: Driver Noah Gragson has been suspended indefinitely by NASCAR and Legacy Motor Club due to liking an insensitive meme with a photo of George Floyd’s face

title: Man rescued from partially submerged jon boat after more than 24 hours out at sea
description: A  25-year-old man was rescued from a partially submerged jon boat after more than 24 hours at sea off the coast of Florida, the U.S. Coast Guard said.

title: Many GOP voters remain undeterred by new Trump indictment
description: In remarks to ABC News, Republican voters largely stood by former President Donald Trump in the wake of his indictment.

title: 3-year-old filly injured in stakes race at Saratoga is euthanized and jockey gets thrown off
description: Maple Leaf Mel was leading the field in the $500,000 Test at Saratoga.

title: WATCH:  Aerial footage shows moment man rescued from submerged boat in Florida
description: A man was rescued from a partially submerged jon boat after more than 24 hours at sea off the coast of Florida, the U.S. Coast Guard says.
